protein.specific_function: Forms calcium-sensitivechloride channels. Permeable to bicarbonate

reference.reference_text: Stohr H, Marquardt A, Nanda I, Schmid M, Weber BH: Three novel human VMD2-like genes are members of the evolutionary highly conserved RFP-TM family. Eur J Hum Genet. 2002 Apr;10(4):281-4.
